insert into p2p_debt_sub_acc_flow ( debt_sub_id, customer_id, biz_id, order_sn, amount, remark, create_time, update_time, creator, reviser, logic_state, biz_state ) values
( #{item.debtSubId}, #{item.customerId}, #{item.bizId}, #{item.orderSn}, #{item.amount}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.creator}, #{item.reviser}, #{item.logicState}, #{item.bizState} )
